messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

On 14 June 2012 11:58, David Symonds <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:
> On Thu, Jun 14, 2012 at 11:56 AM,  <adg@golang.org> wrote:
>
>> I'm not going to submit this until the build dashboard is green.
>
> We seem to have lost the ARM builder.

It just hasn't reported in yet.
I'm not going to submit this until the build dashboard is green.
You're not going to submit with those hashes then. :-(

On Thu, Jun 14, 2012 at 11:56 AM,  <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> I'm not going to submit this until the build dashboard is green.

We seem to have lost the ARM builder.

On Thu, Jun 14, 2012 at 10:01 AM, Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> On 14 June 2012 11:58, David Symonds <dsymonds@golang.org> wrote:
> > On Thu, Jun 14, 2012 at 11:56 AM,  <adg@golang.org> wrote:
> >> I'm not going to submit this until the build dashboard is green.
> > We seem to have lost the ARM builder.
> It just hasn't reported in yet.
>
the linux/arm builder is working properly.
it seems the api check takes a lot of time.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6b00514a213e ***

tag go1.0.2

R=golang-dev, rsc, dsymonds, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6305089
